vote.text: Amendment SA 2682 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2682 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S13935; text: CR S13935) To make a technical corrections.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2682 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2682 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
